Text: RE Predictive Greeksyou send me copies of the Excel reports you want us to modify Thanks Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday January PM To Wong Jeremy Cc Maggi Mike McLaughlin Errol Subject Predictive Greeks Jeremy Each day we receive a report that shows the movement of the positions gamma with a change in the underlying a gamma slide We would like to see how difficult it would be to see the same with vega a vega slide Also there is a report that shows totals for all the greeks by month Could you put a total line at the bottom of this report Please let me know of the difficulty of these changes Thanks John x

RE Skew Project Cc We have Dave Wei x working on the PortCalc change and Margie Nguyen x working on the Excel to fetchsave the vol skew matrix We should have the Excel ready for testing by Friday and the PortCalc by early next week Jeremy x Original Message From Quigley Dutch Sent Tuesday March AM To Jeremy NRON Cc Maggi Mike Griffith John Subject Skew Project Jeremy Can you give me a status report on the skew project along with the contact inf for the person that is working on the project Dutch

RE Skew Project Cc The Vol Skew version of PortCalc has been migrated to production Thanks Jeremy x Original Message From Quigley Dutch Sent Friday March AM To Jeremy NRON Wei Dave Richard NRON Cc Maggi Mike Griffith John May Larry Arnold John Subject Skew Project Jeremy The final checks have been made to the skew evaluation for the ERMS Production The test post ids that Dave Wei has provided have been check and are correct This email is the official request to move the volatility skew evaluation into production Please contact me with any questions at Dutch

Vega Issue Vol Smile Cc The reason for the large Vega numbers on the TopPage report while there were no corresponding changes in the Volatility curves is due to the change in the mid price for the current day versus the prior day The corresponding volatility skews that are added to the vols for the days is causing the large vega numbers For example for deal number QV exp date Jan Current Day Prior Day Mid Price Strike Price Mid Strike Vol Vol Skew Actual Vol Option value for prior day using current days vol Option value for prior day using prior days vol Vega Thank you Jeremy x

Option Questions Cc Regarding OptionGrid Samer can provide you a version that does not write out empty grids to the file by tomorrow He will then try to increase the max number of grids from to And we will write the file to a common drive that you can access from Windows without having to FTP the file from the Unix to the NT drive I will check with my director Zhiyong Wei to see if we can move up the timeline for the OptionGrid running on Windows project Regarding actual gamma PriceDelta Todays Mid Price Prior Days Mid Price Actual delta Prior Days Option Library delta PriceDelta Actual gamma Prior Days Option Library gamma PriceDelta PriceDelta Regarding the Asian model the number of calendar days in a year is for the new version using calendar days We have to merge the new version into the current production PortCalc that has the vol skew changes We should have that in a couple of days I will inform Errol when we are ready for him to start testing Dave is looking into changing PortCalc to provide actual Vegas one without skew and one with skew From our preliminary analysis it would require PortCalc database and report changes to do this Would you also require predictive Vegas and also sensitivities ie or vol changes also Jeremy x

Vol Skew from April Cc Attached is the vol skew that was used for the current day April calc the prior day April calc still used the one you loaded on Mar ie the official postid used the April vol skew for current day but the Mar vol skew for the prior day valuations Jeremy

Vol Skew Cc As per my conversation with John for todays calc of his option book the prior day portion of the calc will be using the vol skew that was mistakenly loaded by Margie yesterday The current day portion of the calc will be using the original vol skew that John loaded on Mar Tomorrow both the current and prior day portion of the calc will use Johns original vol skew Thanks Jeremy

FW New Asian Cc We are testing the new version of the Asian model from Research and there are a couple of issues we need to resolve with Paulo We should have a version ready for your testing by the end of this week I will inform you and Errol when we complete our testing Thank you Jeremy x Original Message From Issler Paulo Sent Tuesday April PM To Tang Shouan Cc Wong Jeremy Subject New Asian Here is the file for the Asian function I am sorry about changing the comments to a C style You may easily change it back to C style by using the replace function in MSWord or from any other editor Paulo Issler

FW New Asian Cc PST John We are testing the new version of the Asian model from Research and there are a couple of issues we need to resolve with Paulo We should have a version ready for your testing by the end of this week I will inform you and Errol when we complete our testing Thank you Jeremy x Original Message From Issler Paulo Sent Tuesday April PM To Tang Shouan Cc Wong Jeremy Subject New Asian Here is the file for the Asian function I am sorry about changing the comments to a C style You may easily change it back to C style by using the replace function in MSWord or from any other editor Paulo Issler

Option Questions Cc Regarding OptionGrid Samer can provide you a version that does not write out empty grids to the file by tomorrow He will then try to increase the max number of grids from to And we will write the file to a common drive that you can access from Windows without having to FTP the file from the Unix to the NT drive I will check with my director Zhiyong Wei to see if we can move up the timeline for the OptionGrid running on Windows project Regarding actual gamma PriceDelta Todays Mid Price Prior Days Mid Price Actual delta Prior Days Option Library delta PriceDelta Actual gamma Prior Days Option Library gamma PriceDelta PriceDelta Regarding the Asian model the number of calendar days in a year is for the new version using calendar days We have to merge the new version into the current production PortCalc that has the vol skew changes We should have that in a couple of days I will inform Errol when we are ready for him to start testing Dave is looking into changing PortCalc to provide actual Vegas one without skew and one with skew From our preliminary analysis it would require PortCalc database and report changes to do this Would you also require predictive Vegas and also sensitivities ie or vol changes also Jeremy x

RE Predictive Greeksyou send me copies of the Excel reports you want us to modify Thanks Original Message From Griffith John Sent Wednesday January PM To Wong Jeremy Cc Maggi Mike McLaughlin Errol Subject Predictive Greeks Jeremy Each day we receive a report that shows the movement of the positions gamma with a change in the underlying a gamma slide We would like to see how difficult it would be to see the same with vega a vega slide Also there is a report that shows totals for all the greeks by month Could you put a total line at the bottom of this report Please let me know of the difficulty of these changes Thanks John x

NETCo Book Setup Cc PST Kam Regarding your question about having Gas book ie portfoliobook code combination with multiple org regions vs having multiple books with the same org region eg DESK in terms of PortCalc performance there is no difference between the setups As you said in your voice mail having one portfoliobook code combination provides more flexibility in terms of defining PortCalc minibooks Please keep in mind that Canadianlogic deals require separate PriceIndex GasDaily and Physical Intramonth books Thanks Jeremy

RE new org regions Cc PST KamRuss As per Russ Felicia created the org regions in CPR as PBregion eg PBWEST PBWEST etc The spreadsheets have it as region eg WEST WEST etc Please let us know if you require a change in the CPR regions Thanks Jeremy Original Message From Keiser Kam Sent Tuesday January AM To Cheung Cecilia Wong Jeremy Cc Valdes John Subject new org regions Can you please change the org regions for the attached books Thanks Kam File Book Request Form Financial finalxls File Book Request Form Central finalxls File Book Request Form East finalxls File Book Request Form Texas finalxls File Book Request Form West finalxls

Curves for UBSNetCo Cc PST Stacey The Gas Risk group is requesting that we preserve only a specified list of curvespub codes for NetCoUBS and to delete the rest of the curves from TAGGERMS Please provide a list of Natural Gas curvespub codes that you would like to preserve in NetCoUBS I am attaching the list of Natural Gas curves to preserve that Kam provided for your reference Thanks Jeremy x

FW UBS curves Cc PST Kam The Financial desk also requested books for WTI HU and HO do we need to preserve these curves in NetCoUBS also If so we would need the curve codespub codes Thanks Jeremy Original Message From Wei Zhiyong Sent Tuesday January PM To Wong Jeremy Cc Stock Steve Subject FW UBS curves Jeremy Please make appropriate changes to the NETCO ERMS database for the following requests What needs to be done is to delete all other curve entries in the egscurvedef and egscurve points and egspubnames which are not listed in the attached file I will talk to you about it Thanks Zhiyong Original Message From Keiser Kam Sent Tuesday January PM To Wei Zhiyong Subject UBS curves Zhiyong We have decided to take the curve history with us to UBS for the attached curves We have changed the names for some of the curves so column J has additional curves that we would like to bring history We will not continue publishing those in the future however Thanks Kam

FW UBS curves Cc PST Kam We would also need Calgarys list of curvespub codes to move to NetCoUBS could you provide the list also Jeremy x Original Message From Stock Steve Sent Tuesday February PM To Wong Jeremy Subject FW UBS curves Whats the status Jeremy Steve Original Message From Wei Zhiyong Sent Tuesday February PM To Stock Steve Cc Keiser Kam Subject RE UBS curves Steve Kam has asked about the status of the below request Would you please provide her with the update Thanks Zhiyong Original Message From Wei Zhiyong Sent Tuesday January PM To Wong Jeremy Cc Stock Steve Subject FW UBS curves Jeremy Please make appropriate changes to the NETCO ERMS database for the following requests What needs to be done is to delete all other curve entries in the egscurvedef and egscurve points and egspubnames which are not listed in the attached file I will talk to you about it Thanks Zhiyong Original Message From Keiser Kam Sent Tuesday January PM To Wei Zhiyong Subject UBS curves Zhiyong We have decided to take the curve history with us to UBS for the attached curves We have changed the names for some of the curves so column J has additional curves that we would like to bring history We will not continue publishing those in the future however Thanks Kam File Netco Curvesxls

Excel with Asian OptionsGriffith is asking that we implement in TAGGERMS the Asian options that are now valued in a Excel spreadsheet these are the Asian options that are similar to Gas Daily options Could you please send me the Excel or place it in the dropbox Thanks Jeremy x

Re TDS Flag in Meta Calc Cc The TDS flag and Rolloff fields in PortCalc are now in production MetaCalc Please note that when copying a metaid these fields are copied as is which is similar to PortCalcs copy postid behaviour Thank you Jeremy x William E Kasemervisz AM To Jeremy CT cc Subject TDS Flag in Meta Calc What is the estimate on when the TDS flag will be in Meta Calc In addition to Gas Coal will start using TDS next week Bill x

went ok the following deals have an invalid counterparty a nd so errored out during the move from NGPRICE to NGPROPT Please change th e counterparty code to a valid one EH N NA NB NF NF NI NI NK NM NM NM Q Q Q Q Q Q Q QQ QQ Thanks Jeremy

FW Ostrip Extension Cc PST Zimin The Gas Daily calcs using the new OStrip model is taking about mins for Larry Mays book Jeff Gossett and his risk admins are requesting that we speed up the calcs From our tests this is due to the calls to the old model to calculate the Premium Vega Vega Charm and Delta as opposed to the call to the old model to calculate the Premium Could you please help us speed up the new OStrip model or provide any suggestions as to what we could do to speed it up Thank you Jeremy x Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Thursday June PM To Lu Zimin Cc Lim Francis S Wei Zhiyong Subject RE Ostrip Extension Zimin We have migrated your extension to the Ostrip model for Larry with the Vega and Vega additions to the production PortCalc However the Ostrip model is a lot slower than the Ostrip model due to the additional calls to the Ostrip model from the Ostrip model to calculate Vega and Vega Is there a way to speed up the Ostrip model We released it because Larry wanted it as soon as possible but we would appreciate it if you have any suggestions as to how we can speed up the calc Thank you Jeremy x Original Message From Wei Zhiyong Sent Tuesday February PM To Wong Jeremy Subject FW Ostrip Extension Jeremy Please check out the changes to OSTRIP Thanks Zhiyong Original Message From Lu Zimin Sent Tuesday February PM To May Larry Zhiyong NRON Cc Gibner Stinson Subject Ostrip Extension Larry and Zhiyong I have finished the extension to Ostrip model Ostrip adds Vega Vega to the fwd volatility risk parameter Vega Vega to the Gas Daily volatility Charm I kept the original Vega unchanged Please see the codes and Excel addin and Ostriptestxls Call me if you have any questions Zimin File OStriptestxls File Exoticaxll File Fsteurospc File Ostripc

FW Ostrip ExtensionPST The Gas Daily Y calc is slow because of the new Ostrip model from Research that Larry requested George Huan and Luchas Johnson were informed at the time we tested the new model and agreed to have it migrated to production because Larry wanted it as soon as possible We asked Zimin for help in speeding the model up but have not heard from him I will contact Zimin again for help in speeding up the Ostrip model Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Thursday June PM To Lu Zimin Cc Lim Francis S Wei Zhiyong Subject RE Ostrip Extension Zimin We have migrated your extension to the Ostrip model for Larry with the Vega and Vega additions to the production PortCalc However the Ostrip model is a lot slower than the Ostrip model due to the additional calls to the Ostrip model from the Ostrip model to calculate Vega and Vega Is there a way to speed up the Ostrip model We released it because Larry wanted it as soon as possible but we would appreciate it if you have any suggestions as to how we can speed up the calc Thank you Jeremy x Original Message From Wei Zhiyong Sent Tuesday February PM To Wong Jeremy Subject FW Ostrip Extension Jeremy Please check out the changes to OSTRIP Thanks Zhiyong Original Message From Lu Zimin Sent Tuesday February PM To May Larry Zhiyong NRON Cc Gibner Stinson Subject Ostrip Extension Larry and Zhiyong I have finished the extension to Ostrip model Ostrip adds Vega Vega to the fwd volatility risk parameter Vega Vega to the Gas Daily volatility Charm I kept the original Vega unchanged Please see the codes and Excel addin and Ostriptestxls Call me if you have any questions Zimin File OStriptestxls File Exoticaxll File Fsteurospc File Ostripc

FW UBS curves Cc PST Kam The Financial desk also requested books for WTI HU and HO do we need to preserve these curves in NetCoUBS also If so we would need the curve codespub codes Thanks Jeremy Original Message From Wei Zhiyong Sent Tuesday January PM To Wong Jeremy Cc Stock Steve Subject FW UBS curves Jeremy Please make appropriate changes to the NETCO ERMS database for the following requests What needs to be done is to delete all other curve entries in the egscurvedef and egscurve points and egspubnames which are not listed in the attached file I will talk to you about it Thanks Zhiyong Original Message From Keiser Kam Sent Tuesday January PM To Wei Zhiyong Subject UBS curves Zhiyong We have decided to take the curve history with us to UBS for the attached curves We have changed the names for some of the curves so column J has additional curves that we would like to bring history We will not continue publishing those in the future however Thanks Kam

FW Holiday Entry in ermt Cc PST Completed thanks Original Message From McLaughlin Jr Errol Sent Thursday January PM To Wong Jeremy Subject RE Holiday Entry in ermt Thanks No Concerns Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Thursday January PM To McLaughlin Jr Errol Cc Lim Francis S Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt Errol I will be performing the following tasks tomorrow morning in the production database You have already approved of both of these tasks please let me know if you do not want me to do this tomorrow Remove Jul and Nov as business days from the NYMEX calendar On completion of this all the holidays will have been removed as business days for The day after Thanksgiving used to be a business day until it has became a holiday since then The futuresoptions expiration dates for Dec NG NYMEX contracts were calculated with the day after Thanksgiving as a business day I will correct these dates for from Nov to Nov for futures from Nov to Nov for options and update the affected NX NX and NXB deals There will be a slight effect on your books We have been performing this task once a year since Please let me know if you have any concernsquestions Thanks Jeremy Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Tuesday January PM To Lim Francis S Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt We need to remove the Thanksgiving holidays together with the fix outlined below please have Errol approve the holiday removal also thanks Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Monday January AM To Lim Francis S Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt days have not been removed Jul and Nov Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Monday January AM To Lim Francis S Subject RE Holiday Entry in ermt Has he approved the removal of holidays Original Message From Lim Francis S Sent Monday January AM To Wong Jeremy Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt Jeremy Errol approved changes where can I find the scripts to run in production Original Message From McLaughlin Jr Errol Sent Thursday January AM To Lim Francis S Subject RE Holiday Entry in ermt Thursday and Friday are both holidays Please make the appropriate changes Errol Original Message From Lim Francis S Sent Thursday January AM To Gossett Jeffrey C McLaughlin Jr Errol Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt We are still waiting for you approval on this Thanks Francis Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Wednesday January AM To Lim Francis S Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt Any progress on this thanks Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Thursday December AM To Lim Francis S Cc Cheung Cecilia Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt Truong was supposed to check with Errol before we do this in prod do you know if he got approval I have done this in devel with Truong we can do this together in stageprod Thanks Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Tuesday November AM To Lim Francis S Cc Vu Truong Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt FrancisTruong Another issue we have to deal with yearly is the day after Thanksgiving it was not a NYMEX holiday until and it seems like it will be a holiday next year The NG futures and options termination dates are stored in ermt as the rd business day from the end of the month and the th business day respectively For November this was calculated with the day after Thanksgiving as a business day these dates may need to change now that it is a holiday We have a number of complicated scripts that updates the termination dates the deals and the averaging dates that we run once a year to fix this problem I will need to work with you and Truong this week to do this for let me setup the scripts and then I will go through with the of you and do the fix together Truong Please check with Errol The day after Thanksgiving is a NYMEX holiday As such the futures termination date for Dec is Nov and not Nov NX date The options termination date for Dec is Nov and not Nov Thanks Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Tuesday November AM To Lim Francis S Cc Vu Truong Subject FW Holiday Entry in ermt Original Message From Wong Jeremy Sent Wednesday September AM To Lim Francis S Cc Husain Karima Cheung Cecilia Vu Truong Subject Holiday Entry in ermt Francis Truong has been in charge of putting in holidays into the database actually we dont store holidays we remove them as business days and Cecilia has been in charge of creating new calendars in the database these duties should probably be done by person with a backup active calendars are currently defined with the user group owner identified NYMEX Gas with EGM and EIM also IPE EGM Houston SIMEX EGM Singapore TOCOM Tokyo EGM Singapore NYMEX IPE this is an intersection of business days ie a holiday in either exchange is a holiday in this calendar EGM Houston We usually remove holidays as business days year at a time a few weeks before the start of the next year by getting the list of holidays from our user group as identified above We then get approval from them as to the day they want us to do it A number of holidays in the future years have already been removed as business days due to user requests Truong has the list Please ensure that this process is continued Thanks Jeremy

Excel with Asian OptionsGriffith is asking that we implement in TAGGERMS the Asian options that are now valued in a Excel spreadsheet these are the Asian options that are similar to Gas Daily options Could you please send me the Excel or place it in the dropbox Thanks Jeremy x

FW New Asian Cc We are testing the new version of the Asian model from Research and there are a couple of issues we need to resolve with Paulo We should have a version ready for your testing by the end of this week I will inform you and Errol when we complete our testing Thank you Jeremy x Original Message From Issler Paulo Sent Tuesday April PM To Tang Shouan Cc Wong Jeremy Subject New Asian Here is the file for the Asian function I am sorry about changing the comments to a C style You may easily change it back to C style by using the replace function in MSWord or from any other editor Paulo Issler

RE West new futures deals Cc Price Willie Harrell got it from Kate Symes who got it from the trader org region DESK comm code MIDC Willie is out today please contact Kelly Lombardi x with todays prices and to change yesterdays prices Original Message From Chang Fran Sent Friday February AM To Jeremy NRON Cc Lande Monica Sabo Valarie Subject West new futures deals Jeremy Thanks for your help yesterday as we finally got the three new futures deals calced However we had a problem with the Mid Price that TAGG system pulled for evaluation of these deals Specifically from the Fowards Detail Report for post id we found that TAGG was using as Mid Price for these three new deals QQ QQ QQ However the curve prices for midcolumbia as of yesterday for these three deals should be and repectively So We are wondering where the came from Would you please let us know the Org Region and Commodity Code that TAGG is using for these three new deals I need to communicate these codes to Enpower Support so they can translate these codes to what they should be in Enpower in order for Enpower to recognize these deals Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks Fran x

Curves for UBSNetCo Cc PST Stacey The Gas Risk group is requesting that we preserve only a specified list of curvespub codes for NetCoUBS and to delete the rest of the curves from TAGGERMS Please provide a list of Natural Gas curvespub codes that you would like to preserve in NetCoUBS I am attaching the list of Natural Gas curves to preserve that Kam provided for your reference Thanks Jeremy x
